biography: Lauri is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, known for his calm demeanor and strategic approach to the game. A member of Pickala Golf Club, Lauri brings a level of precision to the course that is admired by his peers.

While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Lauri's consistent presence in the tournament speaks to his dedication and love for the sport. He has participated in the Hector Trophée four times and is slated to make his fifth appearance in the upcoming edition in 2025.

Off the course, Lauri is known for his keen interest in golf course architecture. Players often find him sketching course layouts during downtime, contemplating the intricacies of each hole. His insights are always appreciated during post-round discussions.
